item.title: No for Each Item in Array in Terraform
item.description: I was importing my team’s PagerDuty setup into Terraform today. There are 6 people in PagerDuty users so I thought, I would create locals block with users as array of map containing each name and email. Then I’d feed local.users into pagerduty_user resource using for_each. locals { users = [ { name = "John Doe" email = "john@company.com" }, { name = "Somebody" email = "somebody@company.com" }, // ... ] } resource "pagerduty_user" "users" { for_each = local.
